Text:
This isn't a real aXXo release. I can't say what the contents are, but it's not a legitimate aXXo release. To make sure a release is a true aXXo release, visit DarkSide RG.

As of today, aXXo's latest release was in march 2009, of a 2008 movie. Unless and until he comes back from his hiatus, any later release using his name is false.

"Be aware of bogus sites and lamers!"
